snippet.title: Theatre of Pain (MS-DOS, 1997) - DAMNATIO playthrough
snippet.description:
Theatre of Pain (MS-DOS, PC game, 1997) 
Published by GT Interactive Software Corp. 
Developed by Mirage Technologies (Multimedia) Ltd. 
Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHztXwm-aGYICDCdCC08vYa-y3_4EA9A6

Theatre of Pain is a Mortal Kombat-esque fighting game featuring characters and settings drawn from Roman history and mythology. 
https://www.mobygames.com/game/dos/theatre-of-pain

MY SAVE GAME  (all characters unlocked) - https://dropmefiles.com/fmWIR


#msdos #oldgames #retrogames #classicgames #msdosgames
